source: Amea paghalulu kakumonie nakee maimpae virusu korona ana  nopikalele
Virusu iaana nopikalele nopilala i  tampisano ilu
Pikombelai. Ciabhe naghumatoso tampisano ilu sumano cumianda-anda i kambelai ghua meteghe.
Dhawuisie maskere. Jari moia namimbali namiaciho atawa nakokudha ilalono maskereno dhiaaso napasalamati mia I lepe-lepeno.
Itaano kabilanga mia iaana cia nakopanaki. Hawite nopajaga kuluno.
Ane mia nokovirusumo agaa cia nacikoni
translated: hawali nopimbali nopolimba panakino (imia agaano ‘orang lain’).
kolie kapoghompu-ghompu hulanomo cia takumonie Inde-indeeno kopanakino.
agaa iluno mia kopanaki nopimbali nopika i...

source: Atawa hulano mia tatangkuno mai isoo
Mohake cia cukamaghadhami cukaghumuncu  bara-bara longkee pooliwange cukaghumuncumo hulamiu.
Ame-meano Lala dhiaso tamikawulu virusu iaana towanuiisie sabo
Virusu iaana nodhadhi padhai ghua pulu pato jamu i wiwino bara-bara.
Mina i palano lima padha i siku
Kolie mughuncu hulamu(atawa hulano mia). Ane ciamo nacitaghai

translated: kolie katokinda. Kawanuie maghimba limamiu kapakeisie sabo.

source: Bakteri iaana nokoana-ana i lalono maskere ane topakee nomelengo pali.
Kakabhiemo maskeremiu ane nojahanamo. Kolie kapake maskere nakolabhimo aalo.
Cia cumooli cughumuncu hulamu cupakeisie sikumu.. sobaepo.

translated: cukamambe atawa cukahomompo bhobha kapakeiisie siku atawa bhobhose.

source: Kabacae kopomba agaano dhoghi i wawo
